body_html:
I was also facing the same issue. The problem was with bazel version that, I have been using.
https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases <- Download bazel-0.2.2.deb for you configuration.
run it using sudo dpkg -i filename.deb.
Check for the bazel version by typing: bazel version , it must say 0.2.2.
Rest follow the tutorials. You must be good to go.

https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases  <- Download bazel-0.2.2.deb for you configuration.

Check for the bazel version by typing: bazel version , it must say 0.2.2.
Rest follow the tutorials. You must be good to go.
body:
I was also facing the same issue. The problem was with bazel version that, I have been using.
https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases  <- Download bazel-0.2.2.deb for you configuration.
run it using `sudo dpkg -i filename.deb`. 
Check for the bazel version by typing: `bazel version` , it must say 0.2.2.
Rest follow the tutorials. You must be good to go.
